abstracts.abstract: Nominates Kelly Claire Simon as a Member of the State Board of Health.

actions.description: ** Appointment Message Carried Over from Previous General Assembly **
Received by the Senate Sen. Laura M. Murphy;  on 01/03/2025
Assigned to Executive Appointments;  on 01/03/2025 - and on 01/07/2025, Due to Sine Die of the 103rd General Assembly
Placed on Calendar Order of Executive Appointments May 6, 2025
Pursuant to Senate Rule 10-1(c), move to compile the following AM's

Motion Filed Appointment Messages Be Acted on Together ** Sen. Laura M. Murphy;  AM 1030597 (ALPLM Board of Trustees)
AM 1040028 (Amusement Ride & Member Attraction Safety Board)
AM 1040057 (Board of Higher Education)
